name: headless
description: Running Burp Pro in headless mode

name: version
description: What Burp version is used: pro, ent

name: port
description: The port used for connecting to the API

name: apikey
description: Setup a custom API key for connecting to Burp

name: path
description: Custom path for locating the file burp.jar

name: scantype
description: What scan type do you want Burp to run (pull: Just pull the results): spider,active,full,pull

name: task
description: Task ID, used for pulling the results when scantype = pull
